div.h2: CARIN RTPBC Prescribable Product Code Value Set

div.p: This value set includes codes used to specify prescribed medications in the US: RxNorm codes that specify drug name, strength and dose form (SBD, SCD, BPCK and GPCK term types) and NDC-11 codes (which represent specific packaged products).
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm where TTY in SCD,SBD,GPCK,BPCK

title.value: CARIN RTPBC Prescribable Product Code Value Set

description.value: This value set includes codes used to specify prescribed medications in the US: RxNorm codes that specify drug name, strength and dose form (SBD, SCD, BPCK and GPCK term types) and NDC-11 codes (which represent specific packaged products).
